title: Life Force
description: More than just a joyful, glorious novel, vintage Weldon, here's a literary handbook to all our pasts and, with any luck, our futures too. The Life Force stirs, Leslie Beck returns — all vital 10 inches of him — bad wives rejoice, good husbands beware — timeless embers burn and blaze... Every wise child — that's you and you and you — should possess this book...
author: Fay Weldon
